properties.scriptBody:
export PROJ_PATH=`echo ${p:ProjectPath} | cut -f1,2 -d"/"`
echo PROJ_PATH is $PROJ_PATH
echo Copying artifacts from ${p:resource/work.dir}/${p:application/Processor-Comp}/${PROJ_PATH}/artifacts to local working directory

cp -rp ${p:resource/work.dir}/${p:application/Processor-Comp}/${PROJ_PATH}/artifacts .

processes.name: Release_Engine
processes.description: This can be used to specify a list of deployments for a particular release

edges.from: Did we find the Release File containing requests?

edges.to: Did we find the Release File containing requests?

edges.from: Did we find the Release File containing requests?

offsets.name: Did we find the Release File containing requests?

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

postProcessingScript.name: BMO-CheckForNewRequests

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

children.name: Did we find the Release File containing requests?

properties.scriptBody:
export JAVA_HOME=${p:component/JAVA_HOME}
ls -al

for name in `cat ${p:Release-Filename} | grep ${p:REPO_ROOT}`
do
    echo Request: $name
    
    reqFile=`echo $name | cut -f5 -d'/'`
    project=`echo $name | cut -f3 -d'/'`
    echo Filename: $reqFile
    echo Project: $project
    
    echo "{
	\"application\": \"${p:application.name}\",
	\"applicationProcess\": \"Trigger_Deploy\",
	\"environment\": \"AUTODP\",
	\"onlyChanged\": \"false\",
	\"properties\": {" > deploy.json
	
	echo "             \"ProjectPath\": \"${p:component/REPO_ROOT}/$project/${p:component/REPO_REQUEST_FOLDERNAME}\"," >> deploy.json
	echo "             \"NewRequestFileName\": \"$reqFile\"" >> deploy.json
	
	echo "	},
	\"versions\": [
	   {
		\"version\": \"latest\",
		\"component\": \"${p:application/Processor-Comp}\"
	   }
	]
}" >> deploy.json

    cat deploy.json
    
    ${p:component/UDClient_Install_Root}/udclient -username ${p:component/UCD_User} -password ${p:component/UCD_Password} -weburl ${p:component/UCD_URL} requestApplicationProcess deploy.json
done

postProcessingScript.name: BMO-CheckForNewRequests

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

children.name: Did we find a New Request?

properties.scriptBody:
export JAVA_HOME=${p:component/JAVA_HOME}

for name in `find . -name "*.req" -cmin -5`
do
    echo Request: $name
    
    reqFile=`echo $name | cut -f5 -d'/'`
    project=`echo $name | cut -f3 -d'/'`
    echo Filename: $reqFile
    echo Project: $project
    
    echo "{
	\"application\": \"${p:application.name}\",
	\"applicationProcess\": \"Trigger_Deploy\",
	\"environment\": \"AUTODP\",
	\"onlyChanged\": \"false\",
	\"properties\": {" > deploy.json
	
	echo "             \"ProjectPath\": \"${p:component/REPO_ROOT}/$project/${p:component/REPO_REQUEST_FOLDERNAME}\"," >> deploy.json
	echo "             \"NewRequestFileName\": \"$reqFile\"" >> deploy.json
	
	echo "	},
	\"versions\": [
	   {
		\"version\": \"latest\",
		\"component\": \"${p:application/Processor-Comp}\"
	   }
	]
}" >> deploy.json

    cat deploy.json
    
    ${p:component/UDClient_Install_Root}/udclient -username ${p:component/UCD_User} -password ${p:component/UCD_Password} -weburl ${p:component/UCD_URL} requestApplicationProcess deploy.json
done

processes.name: Request_Engine
processes.description: This process is called when a git update is found automatically.   It will search for the new requests and trigger their deployment.

propDefs.name: ProjectPath
propDefs.label: Project Path
propDefs.description: The project where the request file resides (e.g. dp_projects/Proj0002/requests)

propDefs.name: Request-Filename
propDefs.label: Request Filename
propDefs.description: The request file that you want to process manually for deployment (e.g. 000000000002.req)

propDefs.name: Request-Filename
propDefs.label: Request Filename
propDefs.description: The request file that you want to process manually for deployment (e.g. 000000000002.req)

propDefs.name: ProjectPath
propDefs.label: Project Path
propDefs.description: The project where the request file resides (e.g. dp_projects/Proj0002/requests)

propDefs.name: Request-Filename
propDefs.label: Request Filename
propDefs.description: The request file that you want to process manually for deployment (e.g. 000000000002.req)

propDefs.name: ProjectPath
propDefs.label: Project Path
propDefs.description: The fully qualified project path where the request file resides (e.g. dp_projects/Proj0002/requests)

processes.name: Trigger_Deploy
processes.description: This is called to trigger the deployments for each request file that is found by the engine.

propDefs.name: NewRequestFileName
propDefs.label: Request Filename
propDefs.description: The request file name that you want to trigger manually for deployment (e.g. 000000000002.req)

propDefs.name: ProjectPath
propDefs.label: Project Path
propDefs.description: The fully qualified project path where the request file resides (e.g. dp_projects/Proj0002/requests)

propDefs.name: Release-Filename
propDefs.label: Release Filename
propDefs.description: The name of the release file to process in the dp_releases folder (e.g. R2020-May-05.list)
